docs.text: Welcome to TestGlossary projects This project uses mkdocs. For full documentation how-to visit mkdocs.org . Commands make install - install project dependencies from requirements.txt file make test - execute all tests make lint - use linter make help - lists all Makefile commands Project layout Makefile # Makefile with simplifications for project maintenance mkdocs.yml # MkDocs configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other documentation related files. tests/ ... # Test related files should be here testglossary/ ... # Main application files must be placed under this directory, following futher structure.
docs.title: Welcome to TestGlossary projects
